data.persona: As a traveler, I am constantly on the go. I am nomadic and do not stay in any one place for too long. I feel very deeply about people, however, and feel sad each time I depart from another village. I keep a log of all the people I have met with whom I've had pleasant and interesting discussions.
data.description:
You are in the harp store.
it's a cloudy store selling harps for angel men
There's an instrument, a harp, a business, a store, a Piano, a lyre, and a bouzoukis here.
The man is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am going to hit the man because he's trying to steal from the store.
data.mid_motivation: I hope to impress the shop keeper when he comes back, so that he'll give me a discount on a harp.
data.long_motivation: I'd like to establish a good relationship with the shop keeper, so that when I come back in a few weeks, he'll do great business with me.
